Welcome.Description: Durandal is a cross-device, cross-platform client framework written in JavaScript and designed to make Single Page Applications (SPAs) easy to create and maintain.

Features.Libraries: Built on top of jQuery, Knockout & RequireJS
Features.Integrates: Integrates with other libraries such as SammyJS & Foundation
Features.Widgets: Make jQuery & Foundation widgets templatable and bindable (or build your own widgets)
